page.title: 20A SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY
page.content: Friday morning at 7.30 a.m.,I lazily get out of bed. My first stop is the bathroom, then back into my room to get dressed. Then I have breakfast. After that, I pack my bag for school. Eight- forty comes quickly and Sarah is off to the High School. I set off for school with Steven and arrive in time. Nine o' clock comes, and I ring the bell. After assembly there's Maths and spe- lling tests! What will my score be? Lunch will come soon, and I will go home. The afternoon comes and goes quickly, after Mrs. Williams has shouted at two noisy boys.Then it's home again at 3.30. On Fridays I don't play with my friends. Instead I play with my compu- ter. I have a drink and some crisps and then I go to bed where I read for half an hour before going to sleep.
